message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $175?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll consider selling the product to you for $190.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $180 would be a fair price for the product considering my budget. Could we agree on that?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $185.
Thank you, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Considering my budget, could we settle on $180 for the product?
